thread.title: VIDEO: Jimmy Fallon and David Alan Grier Watch the Democratic Debate as Donald Trump and Ben Carson
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Jimmy Fallon and David Alan Grier Watch the Democratic Debate as Donald Trump and Ben Carson

author: TV Guide
title: VIDEO: Jimmy Fallon and David Alan Grier Watch the Democratic Debate as Donald Trump and Ben Carson
text: Posted Oct. 15, 2015 at 7:11 AM Updated at 10:33 AM Posted Oct. 15, 2015 at 7:11 AM Updated at 10:33 AM Â» Social News Now here's one debate viewing party we'd like to be part of. On Wednesday's Tonight Show , Jimmy Fallon resurrected his Donald Trump impression to call Dr. Ben Carson (played by David Alan Grier ) and chat about the "h gely boring" Democratic debate. As Carson guzzled NyQuil and had short naps during which he dreamed about Hitler, Trump proposed a drinking game for the debate: take a drink every time one of the candidates said his name. Much to his dismay, none of his Democratic opponents had much to say about him. Check out the sketch below to see which candidate Trump likens to "a turtle that shops at Men's Wearhouse." Other Links From TVGuide.com
